website_summaries.verdict: A very thorough study guide for all aspects of the MCAT exam, not just the most common subjects. Many users report higher overall test scores.
pros: Access to 2 tests and a demo/practice test
Clear step-by-step study guidance, especially in the sciences
cons: Inconsistent collection of previously published editions
Some material is inaccurate or outdated
Considerable amount of extraneous information not on test

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the Biology and CARS books are 2nd edition
customer_reviews.text: All books came new in shrink wrap as expected. But, the Biology and CARS book were 2nd edition, not 3rd edition. EDIT*** Apparently in the 3rd Edition set TPR decided not to change anything from the Biology and CARS books from the 2nd edition. After some research on google I figured this out, you're welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Molitor

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent content review with challenging mcat questions at the end of chapters. Only concern is that some of the questions are too difficult and sometimes require additional information that was not covered in the corresponding chapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The book set as a whole is mediocre and not very well written. It's okay as far as refresher material goes. There are typos and errors in the books that honestly confound me as to how this made it past the 1st edition. Definitely overpriced and should not be your only source to prep or practice for the MCAT.
customer_reviews.author: Vianca Mercado

customer_reviews.title: MCAT Study Material
customer_reviews.text: I used this to study for the MCAT. The format is set up so you read the information like a textbook, but there are questions throughout the text and a quiz section at the end to let you answer practice questions about the content you just reviewed. It also comes with three online practice tests, which I thought were very helpful for learning how to take the test and the format to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Varney

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Informative and easy to read books on all subjects for the mcat
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son was appreciative to receive these books. Hopefully they will be of good help to prepare him for the MCAT’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from a suggestion made ny a ore med student on Youtube, so far very difficult like she said, but hoping for good reason.
customer_reviews.author: Candis

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought the 2016 7 subject Kaplan MCAT review and I can say for certain that I prefer the Princeton review. I just started the physics section and it has a lot more examples, thorough explanations, and is overall more comprehensive and easier to digest the information.
customer_reviews.author: William Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: KAPLAN, not PR
customer_reviews.text: no one uses princeton review anymore, this company doesn’t know the MCAT very well at all. Use Kaplan for content review, Altria for practice exams, berkley review for passages, and UWORLD MCAT. UWORLD UWORLD UWORLD
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Vinson

customer_reviews.title: TPR Review
customer_reviews.text: Great book set! Very easy to read and follow through. There are great explanations of concepts and review material. With diagrams and charts, this book set is perfect for studying and reviewing.
customer_reviews.author: anneh

customer_reviews.title: Books
customer_reviews.text: Book was use , not new . Cover box was broken .
customer_reviews.author: danuta tomczyk

customer_reviews.title: Content great, book condition not great
customer_reviews.text: The books are good, useful, I recommend them however the condition of the press was good but not as expected for a new version. Maybe I was unlucky but my books where slightly damaged and seemed kind of wet.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Alejandro Milla Matute

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected! Get quality of books and content is great:
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Cole

customer_reviews.title: Book came marked up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a "new" set. Came with pages marked up and written on. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Torn book box
customer_reviews.text: The box of the books was torn, so obviously the box was opened before.
customer_reviews.author: Ceren selbes

customer_reviews.title: Indepth Study Tool
customer_reviews.text: This in-depth study tool is perfect for graduate level medical students as they prepare for the MCAT Exam. The MCAT Exam Review, Study and CARS bundle is expensive when compared to other companies that offer MCAT Exam Study and Preparation books and bundles. My Goddaughter said this bundle provides the extra information that is needed for achieving a higher score.
customer_reviews.author: Elegant Furnishings

customer_reviews.title: Outdated
customer_reviews.text: Books are 3rd edition except that the most tested subject on the mcat - biology is unfortunately 2nd edition ! This was not mentioned in the listing !!
customer_reviews.author: Smmn

customer_reviews.title: 2 bio books, no physics
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars; but I got 2 bio books and no physics books. Obviously a mix up. Sadly, I purchased this over 4 months ago, so too late to return. So watch out if you purchase, make sure to double check everything.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good review but lots of mistakes.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for a book that teaches you content. Don't bother with the exams. They have tons of typos, explanation to questions are out of order sometimes so scores don't reflect your knowledge completely. For this price, I suggest something else. Kaplan has been working wonders for me.
customer_reviews.author: lafagüfüeferafa

product_meta.title: The Princeton Review MCAT Subject Review Complete Box Set, 3rd Edition: 7 Complete Books + 3 Online Practice Tests (Graduate School Test Preparation)
